00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 using System.Data;
00024 using System.Collections;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 using Niry.Database;
00029 
00030 using NyFolder;
00031 using NyFolder.Utils;
00032 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00033 
00034 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.BuddyList {
00035     public class Users : IUsers, IDisposable {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC Const
00038         // ============================================
00039         public const string dbName = "users.db";
00040 
00041         // ============================================
00042         // PRIVATE Members
00043         // ============================================
00044         private SQLite sqlite = null;
00045 
00046         // ============================================
00047         // PUBLIC Constructors
00048         // ============================================
00050         public Users() {
00051             // SQLite File Path
00052             string dbPath = Path.Combine(Utils.Paths.ConfigDirectory, dbName);
00053 
00054             // Connect To SQLite DB and Open Connection
00055             this.sqlite = new SQLite(dbPath);
00056             this.sqlite.Open();
00057 
00058             if (this.sqlite.TableExists("users") == false) {
00059                 CreateAccountsTable();
00060             }
00061         }
00062 
00063         // ============================================
00064         // PUBLIC Methods
00065         // ============================================
00067         public void Dispose() {
00068             this.sqlite.Dispose();
00069             this.sqlite = null;
00070         }
00071 
00072         public void Remove (string username) {
00073             string sql = "DELETE from users WHERE username=@Name;";
00074             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00075             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00076             sqlite.ExecuteNonQuery(sql, sqlParams);
00077         }
00078 
00080         public int Insert (string username, bool accept) {
00081             string sql = "INSERT INTO `users` (username, accept) VALUES (@Name, @Accept);";
00082             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00083             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00084             sqlParams.Add("@Accept", (accept == true) ? 1 : 0);
00085             return(sqlite.ExecuteNonQueryGetID(sql, sqlParams));
00086         }
00087 
00088         public void SetAccept (string username, bool accept) {
00089             string sql = "UPDATE `users` SET accept=@Accept WHERE username=@Name;";
00090             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00091             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00092             sqlParams.Add("@Accept", (accept == true) ? 1 : 0);
00093             sqlite.ExecuteNonQuery(sql, sqlParams);
00094         }
00095 
00096         public bool GetAccept (string username) {
00097             string sql = "SELECT accept FROM users WHERE username=@Name;";
00098             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00099             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00100             return(sqlite.ExecuteReadInt(sql, sqlParams) == 1 ? true : false);
00101         }
00102 
00104         public int GetUserId (string username) {
00105             string sql = "SELECT id FROM users WHERE username=@Name;";
00106             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00107             sqlParams.Add("@Name", username);
00108             return(sqlite.ExecuteReadInt(sql, sqlParams));
00109         }
00110 
00112         public string[] GetAllAcceptedUsers() {
00113             string sql = "SELECT username FROM users WHERE accept=@Accept;";
00114             Hashtable sqlParams = new Hashtable();
00115             sqlParams.Add("@Accept", 1);
00116             return(sqlite.ExecuteReadStrings(sql, sqlParams));
00117         }
00118 
00119         // ============================================
00120         // PRIVATE Methods
00121         // ============================================
00122         // +----------+------------------+
00123         // | id       | INTEGER          |
00124         // +----------+------------------+
00125         // | username | VARCHAR(32 + 24) |
00126         // +----------+------------------+
00127         // | accept   | INTEGER          |
00128         // +----------+------------------+
00129         private void CreateAccountsTable() {
00130             string sql = "CREATE TABLE users (" +
00131                             "id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL," +
00132                             "username VARCHAR(56) NOT NULL UNIQUE," +
00133                             "accept INTEGER NOT NULL" +
00134                          ");";
00135             sqlite.ExecuteNonQuery(sql);
00136         }
00137 
00138         // ============================================
00139         // PUBLIC Properties
00140         // ============================================
00141     }
00142 }
